subtitles_text: I ACTUALLY LEARNED ABOUT MYSELF OUT HERE.
THE FACT THAT I WAS ABLE TO NAVIGATE WITHOUT NADIYA--
>> LET'S GO, LET'S GO. >> MAKES ME REALLY PROUD.

I DID IT ALL BY MYSELF. I DESERVE THIS MILLION DOLLARS
BUT JUST BECAUSE I DESERVE IT DOESN'T MEAN IT'S GOING TO COME
TO ME ON A SILVER PLATTER. >> Jeff: NATALIE WINS REWARD.

>> Jeff: ALL RIGHT, IT IS THE REUNION PART OF THE SHOW.
WE HAVE A WINNER, NATALIE. CONGRATULATIONS.
>> THANKS. ( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
>> Jeff: A LOT OF SUPPORT. AND I-- YOU KNOW, SOMETHING I'VE

OUT FIRST, I'M LITERALLY GOING TO BE THE LAST ONE STANDING.

GAME. BUT THAT IS A GIANT RISK TO GIVE

AND I JUST-- I LITERALLY DON'T REMEMBER WHAT I SAID.
